info.+content: Shokugeki no Sōma: Ni no Sara
食戟のソーマ 弐ノ皿

After the qualifying test with curry dishes, eight contestants have entered the quarterfinal of Autumn Elections: Sōma, Megumi, Takumi, Hisako, Alice, Kurokiba, Hayama, and Mimasaka. Their next challenge: bento.
TVアニメ『食戟のソーマ』公式サイト
